item.title: Expectations and Freedom in a Relationship
item.description: People having expectations in a relationship and willing to have freedom in relationships are few of the main reasons for not having a peaceful and healthy relationship with each other. Having or Setting some unrealistic expectations to have in a relationship can contribute to ending their marriage. Honestly both the people should be open in communication to each other in terms of the expectatio
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: South Indian Hindu Marriage - Andhra Style
item.description: South Indian weddings are traditionally going to be planned or happen for one or more than a day, which involve having mehndi for the bride particularly, in some cases times groom as well have mehndi.
